trans-unit.source: Represents a databindable, customized view of a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> for sorting, filtering, searching, editing, and navigation.
trans-unit.target: 代表 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 的可绑定数据的自定义视图，它用于排序、筛选、搜索、编辑和导航。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> does not store data, but instead represents a connected view of its corresponding <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 不存储数据，而改为表示对应的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 的连接视图。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />’s data will affect the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 更改 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 的数据将影响 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />’s data will affect all <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />s associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 更改 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 的数据将影响与之关联的所有 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />。

trans-unit.source: A major function of the <xref:System.Data.DataView> is to allow for data binding on both Windows Forms and Web Forms.
trans-unit.target: 主要函数<xref:System.Data.DataView>是为了允许 Windows 窗体和 Web 窗体上的数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, a <xref:System.Data.DataView> can be customized to present a subset of data from the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Data.DataView>可以自定义呈现的数据子集<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: This capability lets you have two controls bound to the same <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, but that show different versions of the data.
trans-unit.target: 此功能使你具有两个控件绑定到同一<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，但该显示不同版本的数据。

trans-unit.source: For example, one control might be bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataView> that shows all the rows in the table, and a second might be configured to display only the rows that have been deleted from the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一个控件可能绑定到<xref:System.Data.DataView>在表中，显示的所有行和第二个可能会配置为只显示的行已删除从<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable> also has a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataTable>还有<xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This returns the default <xref:System.Data.DataView> for the table.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回默认值<xref:System.Data.DataView>表。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to create a custom view on the table, set the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> on the <xref:System.Data.DataView> returned by the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要创建对表的自定义视图，设置<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>上<xref:System.Data.DataView>返回<xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To create a filtered and sorted view of data, set the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建数据的筛选和排序视图，设置<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Then, use the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Item%2A> property to return a single <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，使用<xref:System.Data.DataView.Item%2A>属性以返回单个<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>。

trans-unit.source: You can also add and delete from the set of rows using the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加和删除的行使用集中<xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you use those methods, the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A> property can set to specify that only deleted rows or new rows be displayed by the <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用这些方法，<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A>属性可以设置以指定只有已删除的行或新行，会显示通过<xref:System.Data.DataView>。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly specify sort criteria for `DataView`, the `DataRowView` objects in `DataView` are sorted based on the index of DataView's corresponding `DataRow` in the `DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不显式指定的排序条件`DataView`、`DataRowView`中的对象`DataView`根据 DataView 的相应索引按`DataRow`中`DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] allows developers to create complex, powerful queries over a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> by using [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 允许开发人员通过创建复杂且功能强大的查询<xref:System.Data.DataSet>使用[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query returns an enumeration of <xref:System.Data.DataRow> objects, however, which is not easily used in a binding scenario.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查询返回的枚举<xref:System.Data.DataRow>对象，但是，这些对象轻松不绑定方案中使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataView> can be created from a [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] query and takes on the filtering and sorting characteristics of that query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataView> 可以从创建[!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)]查询，会采取筛选和排序的查询的特征。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] extends the functionality of the <xref:System.Data.DataView> by providing [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] expression-based filtering and sorting, which allows for much more complex and powerful filtering and sorting operations than string-based filtering and sorting.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[linq_dataset](~/includes/linq-dataset-md.md)] 扩展的功能<xref:System.Data.DataView>通过提供[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]基于表达式的筛选和排序，这样，对于更复杂而功能强大的筛选和排序执行比基于字符串的筛选和排序操作。

trans-unit.source: See [Data Binding and LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-binding-and-linq-to-dataset.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[数据绑定和 LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/data-binding-and-linq-to-dataset.md)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a single <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with one column and five rows.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个<xref:System.Data.DataTable>具有一个列和五个行。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Data.DataView> objects are created and the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A> is set on each to show different views of the table data.
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Data.DataView>创建对象和<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A>上每个设置为显示表数据的不同视图。

trans-unit.source: The values are then printed.
trans-unit.target: 然后打印值。

trans-unit.target: 此类型是安全的多线程读取操作。

trans-unit.source: You must synchronize any write operations.
trans-unit.target: 你必须同步任何写入操作。

trans-unit.source: Starts the initialization of a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> that is used on a form or used by another component.

trans-unit.target: 此初始化在运行时发生。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio .NET design environment uses this method to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio.NET 设计环境使用此方法来启动窗体上使用或由另一个组件的组件的初始化。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataView.EndInit%2A>方法初始化已结束。

trans-unit.source: Using the `BeginInit` and `EndInit` methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用`BeginInit`和`EndInit`方法阻止控件完全初始化之前使用。

trans-unit.source: If this is the default <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />, the <see langword="DataViewManager" /> property returns the default <see langword="DataViewManager" /> for the <see langword="DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 的默认 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />，那么 <see langword="DataViewManager" /> 属性将返回 <see langword="DataSet" /> 的默认 <see langword="DataViewManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the <see langword="DataView" /> was created without a <see langword="DataViewManager" />, this property is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 实例是否可视为相等的实例。

trans-unit.source: Finds a row in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> by the specified sort key value.
trans-unit.target: 按指定的排序关键字值在 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 中查找行。

trans-unit.source: The object to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的对象。

trans-unit.source: Finds a row in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> by the specified sort key value.
trans-unit.target: 按指定的排序关键字值在 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 中查找行。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> that contains the sort key value specified; otherwise -1 if the sort key value does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定排序关键字值的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 中的行的索引；否则为 -1（如果不存在排序关键字值）。

trans-unit.source: The following Visual Basic example uses the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Find%2A> method to return the index of the row that contains the value in the sort key column that you want.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 Visual Basic 示例使用<xref:System.Data.DataView.Find%2A>方法以返回包含所需的排序键列中的值的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: An array of values, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 值的数组，类型为 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Finds a row in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> by the specified sort key values.
trans-unit.target: 按指定的排序关键字值在 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 中查找行。

trans-unit.source: The index of the position of the first row in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> that matches the sort key values specified; otherwise -1 if there are no matching sort key values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 中与指定的排序关键字值匹配的第一行位置的索引；否则，如果不存在匹配的排序关键字值，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The following Visual Basic example uses the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Find%2A> method to return the index of a row that contains specified values in its sort key columns.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 Visual Basic 示例使用<xref:System.Data.DataView.Find%2A>方法以返回包含其排序键列中的指定的值的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowView" /> objects whose columns match the specified sort key value.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowView" /> 对象的数组，这些对象的列与指定的排序关键字值匹配。

trans-unit.source: The column value, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />, to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的列值，类型为 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowView" /> objects whose columns match the specified sort key value.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowView" /> 对象的数组，这些对象的列与指定的排序关键字值匹配。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see langword="DataRowView" /> objects whose columns match the specified sort key value; or, if no rows contain the specified sort key values, an empty <see langword="DataRowView" /> array.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="DataRowView" /> 对象的数组，这些对象的列与指定的排序关键字值匹配；或者，如果任何行都不包含指定的排序关键字值，则为空 <see langword="DataRowView" /> 数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of column values, typed as <see cref="T:System.Object" />, to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的列值的数组，类型为 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowView" /> objects whose columns match the specified sort key value.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see langword="DataRowView" /> objects whose columns match the specified sort key value; or, if no rows contain the specified sort key values, an empty <see langword="DataRowView" /> array.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="DataRowView" /> 对象的数组，这些对象的列与指定的排序关键字值匹配；或者，如果任何行都不包含指定的排序关键字值，则为空 <see langword="DataRowView" /> 数组。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> has been changed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 在成功更改 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 后发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when initialization of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> is completed.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 的初始化完成时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the component is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示组件是否已初始化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the component has completed initialization; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，说明组件已完成初始化；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the data source is currently open and projecting views of data on the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示数据源当前是否已打开并在 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 上映射数据视图。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the source is open; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源已打开，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataView> is a "view" on a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> because it provides custom sorting and filtering of the data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Data.DataView>位于"视图"<xref:System.Data.DataTable>因为它提供自定义的排序和筛选数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataView.IsOpen%2A> property can be queried to determine whether a <xref:System.Data.DataView> has been opened by using the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Open%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataView.IsOpen%2A>可以查询属性来确定是否<xref:System.Data.DataView>已被使用打开<xref:System.Data.DataView.Open%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This property is designed for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设计为仅限内部使用。

trans-unit.source: The index of a record in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 中的记录的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets a row of data from a specified table.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的表中获取数据行。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowView" /> of the row that you want.
trans-unit.target: 所需的行的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowView" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the list managed by the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 管理的列表发生更改时发生。

trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Data.DataView.ListChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Opens a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: 打开一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />。

trans-unit.source: The method lets you manually open the <xref:System.Data.DataView> in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 该方法允许您手动打开<xref:System.Data.DataView>在派生类中。

trans-unit.source: Use the corresponding <xref:System.Data.DataView.Close%2A> method to close the <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
trans-unit.target: 使用相应<xref:System.Data.DataView.Close%2A>方法来关闭<xref:System.Data.DataView>。

trans-unit.source: This property is designed for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设计为仅限内部使用。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: 保留以仅供内部使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression used to filter which rows are viewed in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于筛选在 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 中查看哪些行的表达式。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies how rows are to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定行的筛选方式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: To form a <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> value, specify the name of a column followed by an operator and a value to filter on.
trans-unit.target: 向窗体<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>值时，请指定跟运算符和一个值，要作为筛选依据的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value must be in quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 值必须用引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: "LastName = 'Smith'"
trans-unit.target: "LastName = 'Smith'"

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>属性<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>有关详细信息的类。

trans-unit.source: To return only those columns with null values, use the following expression:
trans-unit.target: 若要只返回那些列具有 null 值，请使用以下表达式：

trans-unit.source: "Isnull(Col1,'Null Column') = 'Null Column'"
trans-unit.target: "Isnull(Col1,'Null Column') = 'Null Column'"

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataView> and sets its <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.DataView>并设置其<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the row state filter used in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 中的行状态筛选器。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewRowState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewRowState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Only rows that have been deleted by using the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A> method will have their <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A> value set to `Deleted`.
trans-unit.target: 已通过使用已删除的行<xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A>方法将具有其<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A>值设置为`Deleted`。

trans-unit.source: Those rows added using the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> method will similarly have the property set to `Added`.
trans-unit.target: 使用添加这些行<xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>方法同样会将属性设置为`Added`。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection> class does not mean that a row will be marked as `Deleted`.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>类并不意味着某一行将被标记为`Deleted`。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A> method instead to make sure that such rows can be viewed in the <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.DataView.Delete%2A>方法改为若要确保这样的行，可以查看<xref:System.Data.DataView>。

trans-unit.source: New rows will also be visible when the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A> is set to `ModifiedCurrent` or `CurrentRows`.
trans-unit.target: 新行也将是可见<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A>设置为`ModifiedCurrent`或`CurrentRows`。

trans-unit.source: Deleted rows will also be visible when the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A> is set to `ModifiedOriginal` and `OriginalRows`.
trans-unit.target: 已删除的行也将是可见<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A>设置为`ModifiedOriginal`和`OriginalRows`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with a single column, and then changes the data and sets the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataView> to display different row sets, depending on the <xref:System.Data.DataViewRowState>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>单个列，然后更改的数据和集<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataView>可显示不同的行集，具体取决于<xref:System.Data.DataViewRowState>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sort column or columns, and sort order for the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" /> 的一个或多个排序列以及排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the column name followed by "ASC" (ascending) or "DESC" (descending).
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，该字符串包含后跟“ASC”（升序）或"DESC"（降序）的列名。

trans-unit.source: Columns are sorted ascending by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，列按升序排序。

trans-unit.source: Multiple columns can be separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 可以用逗号分隔多个列。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly specify sort criteria for `DataView`, the `DataRowView` objects in `DataView` are sorted based on the index of its corresponding `DataRow` in the `DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不显式指定的排序条件`DataView`、`DataRowView`中的对象`DataView`根据其对应的索引按`DataRow`中`DataTable.Rows` `DataRowCollection`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [DataViews](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/dataviews.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Dataview](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/dataviews.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example instructs the <xref:System.Data.DataView> to sort the table by two columns.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例指示<xref:System.Data.DataView>表进行排序，按两列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataTable> also has a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A> property which returns the default <xref:System.Data.DataView> for the table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataTable>还有<xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A>属性，后者将返回默认<xref:System.Data.DataView>表。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to create a custom view on the table, set the <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> on the <xref:System.Data.DataView> returned by the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要创建对表的自定义视图，设置<xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>上<xref:System.Data.DataView>返回<xref:System.Data.DataTable.DefaultView%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can only set the <xref:System.Data.DataView.Table%2A> property if the current value is null.
trans-unit.target: 仅可设置<xref:System.Data.DataView.Table%2A>如果的当前值为 null 的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> of the current <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取<xref:System.Data.DataTable>的当前<xref:System.Data.DataView>。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> based on rows in an existing <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: 根据现有 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 中的行，创建并返回一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Data.DataTable> maintains the values of the following properties from the source <xref:System.Data.DataTable>: <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Namespace%2A>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Prefix%2A>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Locale%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.CaseSensitive%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Data.DataTable>维护源中的以下属性的值<xref:System.Data.DataTable>: <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Namespace%2A>， <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Prefix%2A>， <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Locale%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.DataTable.CaseSensitive%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Each column in the resulting <xref:System.Data.DataTable> contains an identical copy of all the corresponding properties in the underlying <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 在随后出现的每个列<xref:System.Data.DataTable>包含基础中的所有相应属性的相同副本<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataRow> instances in the returned `DataTable` will contain values that are consistent with CLR semantics.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataRow>在返回的实例`DataTable`将包含与 CLR 语义一致的值。

trans-unit.source: That is, for all data types besides user-defined types, the corresponding column values are copied by value.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，对于除用户定义的类型以外的所有数据类型，相应列的值是通过值复制。

trans-unit.source: For user-defined data types, the column data is copied by reference.
trans-unit.target: 对于用户定义数据类型，列数据被复制引用。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> based on rows in an existing <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: 根据现有 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 中的行，创建并返回一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> instance that contains the requested rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 实例，其中包含所请求的行和列。

trans-unit.source: Because this method does not let you specify the name for the output <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, its name is the same as the name of the source `DataTable`.
trans-unit.target: 因为此方法不允许您指定的输出名称<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，其名称是与源的名称相同`DataTable`。

trans-unit.source: Because this method does not let you specify a subset of available columns, the output table contains the same columns as the input table.
trans-unit.target: 因为此方法不允许您指定的可用列的子集，则输出表包含列与输入表的列相同。

trans-unit.source: The following console application example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, fills the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with data, creates a filtered view based on the original data, and finally, creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> that contains the filtered rows.
trans-unit.target: 下面的控制台应用程序示例创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，填充<xref:System.Data.DataTable>数据、 创建基于原始数据的筛选的视图，并最后，创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>包含筛选的行。

trans-unit.source: The example displays the following text in the console window:
trans-unit.target: 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下文本：

trans-unit.source: The name of the returned <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> based on rows in an existing <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: 根据现有 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 中的行，创建并返回一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> instance that contains the requested rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 实例，其中包含所请求的行和列。

trans-unit.source: Because this method does not let you specify a subset of available columns, the output table contains the same columns as the input table.
trans-unit.target: 因为此方法不允许您指定的可用列的子集，则输出表包含列与输入表的列相同。

trans-unit.source: The following console application example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, fills the `DataTable` with data, creates a filtered view based on the original data, and finally creates a `DataTable` with a new name that contains the filtered rows.
trans-unit.target: 下面的控制台应用程序示例创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，填充`DataTable`数据、 创建基于原始数据的筛选的视图，并最后创建`DataTable`使用新名称包含的筛选的行。

trans-unit.source: The example displays the following text in the console window:

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, the returned <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> contains rows that have distinct values for all its columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则返回的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 将包含所有列都具有不同值的行。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A string array that contains a list of the column names to be included in the returned <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串数组，包含要包括在返回的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 中的列名的列表。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> contains the specified columns in the order they appear within this array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 包含指定的列，其顺序与这些列在该数组中的顺序相同。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> based on rows in an existing <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: 根据现有 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 中的行，创建并返回一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> instance that contains the requested rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 实例，其中包含所请求的行和列。

trans-unit.source: Because this method does not let you specify the name for the output <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, its name is the same as the name of the source <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 因为此方法不允许您指定的输出名称<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，其名称是与源的名称相同<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: The following console application example creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, fills the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with data, sorts the <xref:System.Data.DataView>, and finally creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with just two columns, limited to rows in which all values are unique.
trans-unit.target: 下面的控制台应用程序示例创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，填充<xref:System.Data.DataTable>使用数据，排列<xref:System.Data.DataView>，并最后创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>与仅使用两个列，限制为在其中所有值都是唯一的行。

trans-unit.source: The example displays the following output in the console window:

trans-unit.source: The name of the returned <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, the returned <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> contains rows that have distinct values for all its columns.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A string array that contains a list of the column names to be included in the returned <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串数组，包含要包括在返回的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 中的列名的列表。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="DataTable" /> contains the specified columns in the order they appear within this array.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="DataTable" /> 包含指定的列，其顺序与这些列在该数组中的顺序相同。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> based on rows in an existing <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />.
trans-unit.target: 根据现有 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 中的行，创建并返回一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this overloaded version of the <xref:System.Data.DataView.ToTable%2A> method if you have to retrieve distinct values in a subset of available columns, specifying a new name for the returned <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重载的版本的<xref:System.Data.DataView.ToTable%2A>方法如果你需要检索一部分可用列中的非重复值指定返回的新名称<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: If you do not need distinct rows or a subset of columns, see <xref:System.Data.DataView.ToTable%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不需要不同的行或列的子集，请参阅<xref:System.Data.DataView.ToTable%2A>。
